# new Padding(paddings)

**Constructor**

Creates a padding object and initializes its values with the provided object literal.

## Declaration

```swift
constructor(paddings: PaddingConstructorOptions);
```

## Parameters

- **padding**: An object literal with the keys defined in [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/PaddingConstructorOptions].

## Discussion

Use an object literal instance with the keys defined in [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/PaddingConstructorOptions].

```javascript
    // An object literal that conforms to `PaddingConstructorOptions`.
    map.padding = new mapkit.Padding({top: 10, right: 10, bottom: 10, left:10});

@Comment {
    This document is generated from symbols produced
    from the MapKit JS source code.
    Feel free to remove this comment when the content is populated.
}
```

## Creating padding

- **new Padding()**: Creates a padding object with no inset margins.
- **new Padding(top)**: Creates a padding object and initializes its top inset margin with the provided value.
- **new Padding(top, right)**: Creates a padding object and initializes it with the provided top and right side values.
- **new Padding(top, right, bottom)**: Creates a padding object and initializes it with the provided top, right, and bottom values.
- **new Padding(top, right, bottom, left)**: Creates a padding object and initializes it with the provided values.
- **PaddingConstructorOptions**: Initial values of the edge insets for padding.
